mapper.select: SELECT pur.id, ps.paper_group_name, pur.paper_name, ( CASE pur.review_status WHEN 0 THEN "审核不通过" WHEN 1 THEN "审核通过" WHEN 2 THEN "待审核" ELSE "待审核" END ) AS review_status, pur.create_time, a.submitNum FROM ( SELECT user_id, max( create_time ) AS create_time, count( 1 ) AS submitNum FROM paper_upload_record GROUP BY user_id ) a LEFT JOIN paper_upload_record pur ON pur.create_time = a.create_time AND pur.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN paper_setting ps ON ps.id = pur.paper_group_id WHERE pur.id in (#{ids})
